statements: DELETE FROM driving_data WHERE driver_id = 101 AND driving_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM driving_data WHERE incidents > 3 AND avg_speed_kmh < 60;
DELETE FROM safety_improvements WHERE safety_measure = 'Lane Departure Warning System';
DELETE FROM historical_driving_data WHERE duration_minutes > 120 AND average_speed_km_per_hr < 50;
DELETE FROM safety_incidents WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND driver_id = 3
DELETE FROM violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' AND penalty_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM driving_records WHERE driver_id = 100 AND speed < 50;
DELETE FROM driving_records WHERE speed > 100 AND location = 'Highway Junction';
DELETE FROM violations WHERE driver_id = 123 AND violation_type = 'Speeding';
